3.自分から相手に渡す物を 選択します。|<color_yellow>|※相手が選ん: Please choose the items you'd like to trade.|<color_yellow>|※You can also move the cursor to the other|player's items and examine them.|<color_white>|<break>

12.<%sL_PC>の <%sL_STORAGE>がいっぱいで|<%sL_ITEM>: The <%sL_STORAGE> of <%sL_PC> is full and|<%sL_ITEM> cannot be filled, so the|transaction cannot be made...<end>

13.<%sL_STORAGE>がいっぱいで|<%sL_ITEM>を受け取れないため|: The <%sL_STORAGE> is too full to receive|<%sL_ITEM> and the transaction cannot be|completed...<end>

15.<%sL_PC>が決定するのを 待っています。|しばらく お待ちください……。|: Waiting for <%sL_PC> to decide... Please wait|a moment...<break>

16.自分から相手に渡す物を 選択します。|<color_yellow>|※相手が選ん: Please choose the items you'd like to trade.|<color_yellow>|※You can also move the cursor to the other|player's items and examine them.|<color_white>|<break>

18.<%sL_PC>に <%nL_GOLD>ゴールドを|渡せなかったので|取り引きが: Couldn't give <%dL_GOLD> Gold to|<%sL_PC>, so the trade was|unsuccessful.|<end>

22.取り引きの相手が いなくなりました。|<end>: Trade partner is too far away.<end>

30.<%sL_PC>に 取り引きを 申し込みますか？|<yesno><break>: Would you like to trade with <%sL_PC>?|<yesno><break>

32.<speed=0>|とりひきの 説明です！|<br>|他のプレイヤーのキャラに:
Here's how it works! If you offer to trade|for another player's character, and they|accept, you can trade that character for|
|items or gold... You don't want to make a|deal out of the blue, but you do want to|check with the other player first.

33.<%sL_ITEM>は|現在 <%nL_NUM>個 選択しています。|いくつに: <%sL_ITEM> now has <%nL_NUM> selected... How|many do you want to change?<break>

35.<%sL_ITEM>は|すでに 装備されているため|他のプレイヤーに 渡せません: <%sL_ITEM> is already equipped, so you can't|give it to another player...<bw_break>

37.<%sL_ITEM>は|ロックされているため|他のプレイヤーに 渡せません。|<: <%sL_ITEM> is locked and cannot be passed to|another player...<bw_break>

38.<%sL_ITEM>は|男性から女性にしか 渡せません。|<bw_break>: <%sL_ITEM> can only be given by a man to a|woman...<bw_break>

39.<%sL_PC>は もう今日の分の|<%sL_ITEM>を受け取っているので|渡: I can't give you <%sL_PC> because you've|already received <%sL_ITEM> for today!<bw_break>

Please|make sure you're dealing with someone you can|trust.<color_yellow>This message is displayed when a high value|deal is made...<color_white>Buying and selling game data for real money|(RMT) is prohibited and will be punished...|Please be careful not to do this...<bw_break>

41.他のプレイヤーに 渡せないアイテムが|選択されています。|<bw_break>: You've selected an item that can't be given|to another player.<bw_break>
